title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 830.5 - Carriers may establish different credit periods in tariff rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 830.5 - Carriers may establish different credit periods in tariff rules

State Regulations

Carriers may publish tariff rules establishing credit
periods different from those in section
830.1
of this Part. Such credit
periods shall not be longer than 30 calendar days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
830.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
